overview: A woman who is researching alien abductions for a book receives increasing reports of nocturnal attackers who are described as resembling Santa Claus.  She enlists the aid of a scholar of mythology to see if the legend of Santa has a darker side, and what she discovers is more horrifying than she could never have expected.
tagline: He sees you when you're sleeping... He knows when you're awake...
title: Santa Claus: Serial Rapist
